subject: Sales
title: Handshakes, Posture, and Presence
description: A quick win: understand Handshakes, Posture, and Presence.

hook.text: A limp handshake costs credibility before the first word. First impressions are entirely physical.

buildup.text: Posture, grip strength, and physical presence set the tone for every professional interaction.

discovery.text: Amy Cuddy's research showed expansive postures boost confidence hormones in just two minutes.

twist.text: Power posing was debated, but the core holds: how you carry yourself changes how others perceive you.

climax.text: Stand tall, shake with purpose, and occupy space with calm confidence. Presence precedes persuasion.

punchline.text: Stand tall. The words will follow with authority.

quiz.question: What did Amy Cuddy's research demonstrate?
options: Expansive postures can boost confidence hormones
